DOC.brief_title: A Study Adalimumab Adult Japanese Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Meet ACR criterion diagnosis active RA screening baseline visit > 10 swollen joint , > 12 tender joint . Subjects must fail prior treatment one DMARDs . A negative ( serum ) pregnancy test female subject childbearing potential screening negative ( urine ) pregnancy test prior study drug administration . Body weight less equal 100 kg A history , current , acute inflammatory joint disease different origin RA . Prior treatment TNF antagonist , include adalimumab . Any ongoing chronic active infection major episode infection require hospitalization treatment IV antibiotic . Unstable ischemic heart disease , active inflammatory bowel disease , active peptic ulcer disease , recent stroke poorly control medical condition .
